headline: LMT, NOC and GD: The U.S. Defense Titans Thriving in the Trump Era
summary: Investors often look to defense stocks during unpredictable times, and 2025 is no exception. Just months into a new Trump administration, signs point to potentially historic defense spending, as reports suggest a budget near $1 trillion for the Pentagon. Heightened tensions with China, continuing unrest in Eastern Europe, and NATO allies ramping up their military outlays have all contributed to a favorable outlook for the industry. headline: Lockheed Martin Secures Contract Involving F-35 Fighter Jet Program
summary: LMT secures a $22.5 million modification contract to provide maintenance and sustainment support for the F-35 jet program's Reprogramming Laboratory facilities and systems.

headline: General Dynamics Wins Contract to Aid Columbia Class Submarine Program
summary: General Dynamics is set to supply new procurement spares to support Columbia ballistic missile submarine class development, production and installation.
